bug.short_desc: gmail doesn't load the first time

assigned_to.name: Nobody; OK to take it and work on it

long_desc.thetext:
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.0; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0 Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.0; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0
Whenever i surf to gmail, the loading bar gets stuck on lets say 95%, hitting reload doesn't reload the page, and only by surfing to another page and then return to gmail, it will try again. Usually it will get through the second time.
Also, switching accounts (if you have multiple accounts) usually doesn't switch accounts the first time, but the second time it does.
Reproducible: Always
Steps to Reproduce: 1. go to gmail 2. log in 3. the bar gets stuck 4. hit reload, it doens't do anything 5. surf to other page 6. go back to gmail and repeat steps 1 & 2 7. you are now logged in. Actual Results: see steps to reproduce for results
Expected Results: at 2. you should already be logged in at 3. the page should be reloaded

Does the issue still occur if you start Firefox in Safe Mode? http://support.mozilla.com/en-US/kb/Safe+Mode
How about with a new, empty profile? http://support.mozilla.com/en-US/kb/Basic+Troubleshooting#Make_a_new_profile
